name: New Hampshire

processing_metadata.description: Official New Hampshire DMV processing rules and validation requirements

global_rules.code_system: Information needed - research plate type code system
global_rules.character_restrictions: O only on personalized plates; standard uses 0

stacked_characters.position: INCLUDE 'CH' and other stacked characters throughout plate. Symbols (&, +, -) can appear anywhere in plate number.
stacked_characters.notes: INCLUDE CH. ALWAYS INCLUDE symbols (&, +, and, -). Dropdown always Standard, not 'DASH IN tag'. NH ONLY accepts these symbols.

processing_metadata.character_modifications: Allows letter O on personalized plates

plate_type.description: Letter O allowed on personalized plates

notes: New Hampshire uses letter 'O' only on personalized/vanity plates. Standard plates use only number zero '0'. Source: OOS.txt compilation - requires verification with official DMV documentation. Letter 'O' only appears on personalized/vanity plates; standard plates use '0'.
